snippet: A powerful car bomb ripped through a market in northwestern Pakistan on Friday, killing at least 11 people, the police said.
abstract: Bomb explodes in northwestern Pakistan market, killing at least 11 people and wounding 20 others; no one has claimed responsibility for the attack.
lead_paragraph: A powerful car bomb ripped through a market in northwestern Pakistan on Friday, killing at least 11 people, the police said.

headline.seo: Bomb Kills at Least 11 People at Market in Pakistan
headline.main: Pakistan: Bomb Kills at Least 11 People at a Market
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Bomb Kills at Least 11 People at a Market
